mapper.select: /* SELECT : ADVRTS_TP_CODE */ SELECT CODE_ID , CODE_VAL FROM dreamsearch.MOBON_COM_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT SUM(TOT_EPRS_CNT) TOT_EPRS_CNT , ADVRTS_TP_CODE FROM MOB_MEDIA_PAR_MTH_STATS WHERE STATS_MTH = CAST(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m') AS INT) GROUP BY ADVRTS_TP_CODE ) Z ON CODE_ID = ADVRTS_TP_CODE WHERE CODE_TP_ID = 'ADVRTS_TP_CODE' ORDER BY IFNULL(Z.TOT_EPRS_CNT,0) DESC , CODE_ID DESC
